glsa.title: stunnel: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in stunnel, the worst of which may cause a Denial of Service condition.

background.p: The stunnel program is designed to work as an SSL encryption wrapper between a client and a local or remote server.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in stunnel. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker could cause a Denial of Service condition or disclose potentially sensitive information.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All stunnel users should upgrade to the latest version:
